"How many people are affected by GM2-gangliosidosis, AB variant ?",The AB variant is extremely rare; only a few cases have been reported worldwide.,GHR,"GM2-gangliosidosis, AB variant"
"What are the genetic changes related to GM2-gangliosidosis, AB variant ?","Mutations in the GM2A gene cause GM2-gangliosidosis, AB variant. The GM2A gene provides instructions for making a protein called the GM2 ganglioside activator. This protein is required for the n
